projects.name: Rust EXIF Renamer
projects.description: Rename photos in a given directory to their EXIF DateTimeOriginal and viceversa

projects.name: Jekyll AI Related
projects.description: Jekyll plugin to generate list of related posts using AI and save them in site.data

projects.name: Zed unofficial Windows builds
projects.description: Unofficial stable and pre-release builds of the Zed editor for Windows, with version and release type matching. Easy install via scoop or pwsh script. Not affiliated with Zed Industries

projects.name: what-size.yazi
projects.description: A plugin for yazi to calculate the size of current selection or current working directory

projects.name: zellij-what-time
projects.description: Zellij plugin to show host system date and/or time in the status bar. Zero-config, but customizable. Inspired by zellij-datetime

projects.name: appimage_updater
projects.description: A CLI tool to look for AppImages in your $PATH and call appimageupdatetool to bulk update them

projects.name: Notion-to-Jekyll
projects.description: A tool to manage Jekyll drafts and posts (including assets) via Notion

projects.name: github-commit-sign
projects.description: A node module and CLI tool to perform multi-file signed commits on a GitHub repo through their GraphQL APIs. Good for CI/CD environments

projects.name: Jekyll ListMe
projects.description: Jekyll plugin to list tags, categories, posts, pages, and more of your Jekyll website. It outputs data as plain text, CSV, TSV, PSV, JSON, or YAML

projects.name: zenpath.xplr
projects.description: A xplr theme inspired by zentable.xplr

projects.name: Workspace
projects.description: A workspace-in-a-container development environment, based on my dotfiles.

projects.name: ephemeral
projects.description: Bookmarkable, ephemeral text editor that runs in your browser

projects.name: Notion-to-Text
projects.description: Get content of notion.site pages in plain text or as JSON

projects.name: fpira.com
projects.description: This very website and blog. It started off Jekyll Now, quickly became an heavily modified fork with more features and a custom SCSS framework coded from scratch. It is a place to tinker and test things, often resulting in overengineering for a personal website. I keep it on latest Jekyll. It's built and hosted on Vercel, with help of GitHub Actions.

projects.name: Rebrandly CLI
projects.description: An unofficial command line client to shorten URL using rebrandly.com.

projects.name: iA Writer templates
projects.description: Self-made templates for the awesome iA Writer. You can use them on both mobile and desktop version of the app.

projects.name: Alfred Workflows and Themes
projects.description: Useful Alfred workflows to enhance your productivity on Mac. Good for developers and power-users.

projects.name: Google Photos EXIF fixer
projects.description: Script to fix pictures EXIF metadata before upload them to Google Photos.
